attributes.action: Resuscitation and life saving taught in schools as part of national curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: There is no such requirement in schools to teach this it should be mandatory for everyone.
attributes.background: Introducing of first aid into school curriculum including use of equipment. It would save lives and stay with people in basic knowledge throughout adult life .

rejection.details: First aid and life saving skills, including how to administer CPR and learning about defibrillators, are already on the Health Education curriculum in England.
